channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: California Was Never The ‘Homeland’ Of Mexican Invaders
item.description: The notion that California and the Southwest are a Mexican 'homeland' is absurd if you look at the history of the region.

item.title: Forgetting the Denominator
item.description: Where Eicher fails in an otherwise admirable volume is in her decision to praise Churchill too much, and explain Mellon too little.

item.title: Utah Has Found the Right Middle Ground on Artificial Intelligence
item.description: We don’t have to choose between innovation and safety. With the right structure, we can have both.

item.title: Trump administration ramps up Minnesota probe after transgender pitcher wins title
item.description: The Trump administration has prioritized its investigation into Minnesota's transgender-athlete policies after a male-born pitcher powered the Minneso...

item.title: Same-Day Registration Is Too Easily Gamed By Leftists
item.description: Same-day registration has become a way to flood the zone with mystery voters — officials lack the time to validate registrations.

item.title: The Government Is Not Going to Save Hollywood
item.description: Subsidizing film and television production only props up an obsolete system.

item.title: Trump says he's no king despite protesters contending he is
item.description: President Trump brushed off the planned "No Kings" protests across the country this weekend against his policies.

item.title: SBC Passes Resolution Demanding FDA ‘Immediately Revoke’ Mifepristone Approval
item.description: The resolution acknowledges the abortion pill causes unborn babies deaths and ‘physical, emotional, and spiritual harm to the mother.’

item.title: Texas' Abbott deploys 5,000 National Guardsmen to avert anti-Trump violence
item.description: Gov. Greg Abbott deployed 5,000 Texas National Guard troops to locations across his state Thursday to try to head off the chance of anti-Trump protest...

item.title: After Chastising Trump For Calling BLM Rioters ‘Thugs,’ Democrats Embrace The Term To Smear ICE Agents
item.description: If Democrats didn’t have double standards, they’d have no standards at all. Such was the case during a Thursday House committee hearing, in which Rep....

item.title: Mourners pay respects to late Rep. Charles Rangel as his body lies in state at New York City Hall
item.description: Mourners are paying their respects to former U.S. Rep. Charles Rangel as his body lies in state Thursday at New York City Hall, an honor bestowed upon...

item.title: Trump says Israel still considering bombing Iran
item.description: President Trump said an Israeli airstrike on Iran is a possibility, but stopped short of saying it will happen soon.

item.title: Don’t Give Obama Credit For Cooking The Books To Inflate Deportations
item.description: Amid riots in Los Angeles and other cities nationwide against immigration enforcement, some have revived the old talking point that former President B...

item.title: Texas Is Right to End the Heartland Flyer
item.description: The state-supported Amtrak service is a terribly inefficient way to transport 200 people per day.

item.title: The Wrong Way to Handle the China Threat
item.description: The hazy deal announced by President Trump is, at best, a temporary reprieve snatched out of defeat.
